/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings and trees, their colors muted under the clear blue sky. Power lines crisscross above, adding a touch of urbanity to the otherwise natural landscape. Cars are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the life and activity in this part of the city. The image is bathed in the soft light of day, highlighting the details and colors of the scene.
